Please enter two numbers x and y in this form: x,y.
X is 81158 so in base 2 X is 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010011110100000110
Y is 64 so in base 2 Y is 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001000000
The new X value is 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010011110100000110
Is the 7th bit in Y on? YES.
